com.c301t19.cs.ualberta.seekaride.core

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.c301t19.cs.ualberta.seekaride.core.User
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Driver, Rider

    public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    Base Controller class for a User. Inherited by Rider and Driver.

        Get the current request in progress, if it exists.

      • clearRequestInProgress

        public void clearRequestInProgress()
        Sets the requestInProgress to null. To be called when a request is completed.

      • hasReceivedNotification

        public boolean hasReceivedNotification()
        Returns true if the user has already been notified recently of an accepted request.
        Returns:
        true if the user has already been notified recently of an accepted request.

      • setReceivedNotification

        public void setReceivedNotification(boolean receivedNotification)
        Set to true once the user receives a notification of an accepted request. Set to false once the request is complete and the user can start a new request.
        Parameters:
        receivedNotification -
